verses.text_plain: Great is the Lord, and greatly to be praised in the city of our God, in the mountain of his holiness.
verses.verse_html:
1Great is the Lord, and greatly to be praised in the city of our God, in the mountain of his holiness. ▼
▼ for: or, of

verses.text_plain: Beautiful for situation, the joy of the whole earth, is mount Zion, on the sides of the north, the city of the great King.
verses.verse_html: 2Beautiful for situation, the joy of the whole earth, is mount Zion, on the sides of the north, the city of the great King.

verses.text_plain: God is known in her palaces for a refuge.
verses.verse_html: 3God is known in her palaces for a refuge.

verses.text_plain: For, lo, the kings were assembled, they passed by together.
verses.verse_html: 4For, lo, the kings were assembled, they passed by together.

verses.text_plain: They saw it, and so they marvelled; they were troubled, and hasted away.
verses.verse_html: 5They saw it, and so they marvelled; they were troubled, and hasted away.

verses.text_plain: Fear took hold upon them there, and pain, as of a woman in travail.
verses.verse_html: 6Fear took hold upon them there, and pain, as of a woman in travail.

tokens.text: as of a woman in travail

verses.text_plain: Thou breakest the ships of Tarshish with an east wind.
verses.verse_html: 7Thou breakest the ships of Tarshish with an east wind.

verses.text_plain: As we have heard, so have we seen in the city of the Lord of hosts, in the city of our God: God will establish it for ever. Selah.
verses.verse_html: 8As we have heard, so have we seen in the city of the Lord of hosts, in the city of our God: God will establish it for ever. Selah.

verses.text_plain: We have thought of thy lovingkindness, O God, in the midst of thy temple.
verses.verse_html: 9We have thought of thy lovingkindness, O God, in the midst of thy temple.

verses.text_plain: According to thy name, O God, so is thy praise unto the ends of the earth: thy right hand is full of righteousness.
verses.verse_html: 10According to thy name, O God, so is thy praise unto the ends of the earth: thy right hand is full of righteousness.

verses.text_plain: Let mount Zion rejoice, let the daughters of Judah be glad, because of thy judgments.
verses.verse_html: 11Let mount Zion rejoice, let the daughters of Judah be glad, because of thy judgments.

verses.text_plain: Walk about Zion, and go round about her: tell the towers thereof.
verses.verse_html: 12Walk about Zion, and go round about her: tell the towers thereof.

verses.text_plain: Mark ye well her bulwarks, consider her palaces; that ye may tell it to the generation following.
verses.verse_html:
13Mark ye well her bulwarks, consider her palaces; that ye may tell it to the generation following. ▼
▼ Mark…: Heb. Set your heart to
 , ▼
▼ consider: or, raise up

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Mark…: Heb. Set your heart to
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Mark…: Heb. Set your heart to
▼ consider: or, raise up

verses.text_plain: For this God is our God for ever and ever: he will be our guide even unto death.
verses.verse_html: 14For this God is our God for ever and ever: he will be our guide even unto death.
